content: Security of the One Who Trusts in the Lord.
Will remain secure  rest in the shadow of the Almighty [whose power no enemy can withstand].
I will say of the , “He is my refuge and my fortress,
My God, in whom I trust [with great confidence, and on whom I rely]!”
For He will save you from the trap of the fowler,
He will cover you  completely protect you with His pinions,
And under His wings you will find refuge;
His faithfulness is a shield and a wall.
